DOC.detailed_description: The study performance 12 patient submit bilateral sinus lift procedure . Six month bilateral sinus lift perform randomly way , use graft material ( 100 % autologous bone graft 100 % xenograft ) , place 1 3 implant maxillary sinus . Wait six month expose implant . At end 13 month implant placement charge . Implant placement ( 6 month sinus lift procedure ) : - Both side treat session . - Patients receive 2g Amoxicillin one hour procedure . Patients allergic penicillin give Clindamycin 600 mg 1 hour implant placement procedure . - Patients rinse 1 minute prior flap elevation 0.12 % chlorhexidine mouthwash . - After delivery local anaesthesia , incision flap elevation , recommendation various implant manufacturer follow place 1 3 implant 10-15 mm long per posterior upper ( premolar-molar area ) maxillary sinus . - The neck implant place flush bone implant submerge soft tissue flap suture . - Baseline intraoral radiograph study implant take . Post-implant placement instruction : - Chlorhexidine mouthwash 0.12 % 1 minute twice day 2 week . - Ibuprofen 400 mg prescribe take 2-4 time day meal , patient instruct take absence pain . Patients gastric problem allergic ibuprofen receive paracetamol 1 g instead . - Sutures remove 10 day . Abutment connection ( 6 month implant placement ) : - Both side treat session . - Patients rinse 1 minute prior flap incision 0.12 % chlorhexidine mouthwash . - Mucosa punch flap elevate accord personal preference surgeon , important side treat way . - Individual implant test stability . - Impressions take . - Healing abutment place . Post-abutment connection instruction : - Chlorhexidine mouthwash 0.12 % 1 minute twice day 2 week . - Ibuprofen 400 mg prescribe take 2-4 time day meal , patient instruct take absence pain . Patients gastric problem allergic ibuprofen receive paracetamol 1 g instead . - Sutures remove 10 day . Prosthetic phase : - Within one month abutment connection , implant manually test stability . - Provisional reinforced acrylic restoration definitive screw-retained provisionally cement ( allow implant stability assessment ) metal-resin metal-ceramic bridge rigidly join 2 3 implant deliver . - Implants splint prosthesis , implant support one tooth element . - The connection teeth implant prosthesis allow . - Similar procedure material use patient . - The occlusal surface slight contact opposite dentition . - Intraoral radiograph clinical picture study implant take initial loading . Maintenance : - All patient recall every 6 month prosthetic load delivery professional maintenance individual basis . - Dental occlusion evaluate maintenance visit .
DOC.criteria: Any partially edentulous patient bilateral edentulism posterior maxilla ( premolar and/or molar ) similar degree bone resorption require one three implant side , 18 year old , able sign inform consent . For potentially included patient preoperative CBCT ( cone beam compute tomography ) CT scan OPGs ( orthopantomograph ) must obtain attached file . The vertical bone height maxillary sinus implant sit must 15 mm bone thickness least 6 mm measure CBCT ( conebeam compute tomography ) CT scan . Smokers include patient group : 1 ) non smoker ; 2 ) light smoker ≤ 10 cigarettes/day ; 3 ) heavy smoker ≥ 11 cigarettes/day , accord declare . General contraindication implant surgery .
